issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

In the Kitchen Sink, check out the custom table view (the Facebook knock off) and search the table. When the search bar come up, you can flick and scroll it and the underlying native table view. This has been confirmed on iPhone.

{html}
fields.summary: Scrolling search bar and table view

comments.body:
{html}

(from [646900e8efd1fb7e43fc74449f4452aedb29dd26]) Fixed scrolling in tableviews during search Closes #368 http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/646900e8efd1f...

{html}
